remarks.format: ## Remarks 子可以使用這個方法，而不是覆寫的屬性值變更時回應以提供全新函式。Subclasses of the can use this method to respond when the value property changes instead of overriding the to provide a new function. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性回呼和驗證](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-callbacks-and-validation.md)。For more information, see [Dependency Property Callbacks and Validation](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-callbacks-and-validation.md). 方法會引發 事件。The method raises the event. 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項以視覺方式指出以某種方式的屬性。The control visually indicates the property in some way. 比方說，滑桿和捲軸控制項有與同步處理的縮圖的控制項。For example, the slider and scrollbar controls have a thumb that is synchronized with the of the control. 如果您設定數值，使其小於屬性，設定為。If you set to a number that is less than the property, is set to . 如果您設定的數字大於屬性，設定為。If you set to a number that is greater than the property, is set to . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , |
